      • writeLinesToTextFile

        public static void writeLinesToTextFile(List<String> lines,
                                        String fileName)
        This is a simple method that writes the elements of an ArrayList of Strings into lines in the text file fileName.
        Parameters:
        lines - The ArrayList of Strings to be written
        fileName - Name of the text file to save the ArrayList to

      • bytesToString

        public static String bytesToString(byte[] checksum)
        Convert bytes of an MD5 checksum into common alpha-numeric String representation.
        Parameters:
        checksum - The digested result from an MD5 instance.
        Returns:
        The alpha-numeric String representation of the checksum.

      • calculateMD5OfFile

        public static String calculateMD5OfFile(String fileName)
        Performs an MD5 checksum on the provided file and returns the result.
        Parameters:
        fileName - Name of the file on which to perform the checksum
        Returns:
        Checksum result String or null if no file was found.
